verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kraistava jeevitam soubagyajeevitam Prabhu pillalaku entho aanandam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kastamulu vachchina nashtamulu vachchina Yesu prabhuve naa sahakaari{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ee lokaghanatha nannu vidichinan Lokastulellaru nannu vidichinan Naa sahodarulu nannu vidichinan Yosepu devude naa sahakaari{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Andakaarambu bhuvi naavarinchina Rajulu ghanulu shatruvulainanu agnigundamulo Simhapu bonulo Daaniyelu devude naa sahakaari{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa manchi kaapari shresta snehitudu Shaashwata raaju naa sahayakudu bhaaram Naakenduku vyaakulamenduku Prabhu prajalato ne kirtinchedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Boora shabdambu mrogedivela Shramalondina naa prabhuni chuchedan Enaado eppudo neevu vachchedavu Aanaati varaku ne kanipettedan{/lang-eng}
